address: 832 S. Greenfield Rd Suite 101 Gilbert, AZ  85296
review description: Good food. Good service. Had great time

name: Venue's Cafe
review description: This is a staff that knows how to read its patrons and deliver its services to highlight the mood the patrons have established. Toni was a fantastic server ready to recommend dishes, answer questions, and play into the mood of the table. Shannon, too, made sure we felt like valued guests. Thanks to all for Fred's birthday dessert...he devoured the cobbler! Next time we will dine at about 7:00 and stay for the music!

name: Verona Chophouse
review description: Excellent brunch on Father's Day... would return

name: Village Tavern Scottsdale
review description: The food was delicious and the service very good.

name: Vito's Pizza
address: 10999 N. Frank Lloyd Wright Blvd Scottsdale, AZ  85259
review description: our favorite neighborhood Italian Restaurant

name: Vito's Pizza and Italian Ristorante
review description: This time we went to the Vito's in Mesa, much better than the one in scottsdale. The pizza was better as well as the service.

name: Vivace Restaurant
review description: Our next door neighbour is an Italian lady (from Italy). She only dines at Vivace. Her son is a fan too, and so are we now.

name: Vogue Bistro
address: 15411 W. Waddell Rd Suite 108 Surprise, AZ  85379
review description: The best thing about the entire dinner was the pineapple tarte tatin. Thought it was overpriced for the quality of the food and we are foodies!

name: White Chocolate Grill - Scottsdale
review description: The Food and Service were both Excellent!

name: Wildfish Seafood Grille - Scottsdale
review description: We went here for a birthday celebration and they treated us wonderfully. We had the best time that night. The food was amazing! Every course we had was great!

name: Wildflower - Tucson
review description: Good food. Went for a nice lunch on a Sunday. Lunch menu is good. Would go back to see how breakfast is there as well.

name: Wine Me Dine Me - Hyatt Regency Scottsdale
address: 7500 E. Doubletree Ranch Rd. Scottsdale, AZ  85258
review description: My wife and I celebrated our seventh wedding anniversary with the SWB's "Wine Me, Dine Me" experience, and we were thrilled with the service, quality of the food dishes, and the inter-activeness with the staff.

name: Wright's at the Biltmore
address: Arizona Biltmore 2400 E Missouri Phoenix, AZ  85016
review description: My husband and I celebrated our anniversary at Wright's. Our head server was somewhat unfriendly and seemed impatient, but the assistant servers made up for it. We started with the terrine (foie gras), which was very tasty, and the lobster bisque, which we found overly salty and bland with no depth of flavor. It seemed like a lot of tables were ordering it, and it looked gorgeous with the golden puff pastry on top, but alas, not a winner. I had the beef wellington--fantastic and the star of the night, while my husband ordered the lamb rack. He thought it was cooked well, but didn't have as much seasoning as he would have liked. Wright's kindly gave us a complimentary chocolate souffle for dessert. Delicious.

name: Wrigley Mansion - Geordie's
review description: Historic spot in a great location. And food and service are both really improving. Still a need to spiff the place up a bit, work on some service refinements and cater to other than just the "deal chicken" mentality...

name: Zinc Bistro
review description: Nice experience especially for late night dining. The filet mignon was ordered medium rare and came out medium to medium well. Because the kitchen was closing we didn't send it back and have some regret about that. But overall a good experience. Steak frites was superb.

name: Z'Tejas Chandler
review description: Awesome as always. Have not had a bad dish yet.

name: Z'Tejas Gateway
review description: There wasn't anything special about the restaurant. I was hoping for something a bit nicer than a regualr mexican food restaurant, but I would have had a good of any experience and food as Macayo's.

name: Z'Tejas Scottsdale
review description: Terrific service! Ask for Jasmine when you go - she'll take awesome care of you :)

name: Z'Tejas Tempe
review description: Very nice resturant, with very good food. The corn bread was fantastic, I could have eaten the whole pan myself.

name: ZuZu - Hotel Valley Ho
review description: We were there for M Day's brunch. We didn't order any apps, went right to the main course. After a while of waiting, they brought out some warm scones that should have probably come out sooner. As we were about to take our first bites into them, our main meals arrived. The up side? We didn't fill up on scones before our meal. I had also mentioned my daughters birthday on the Open Table reservation, which the restaurant acknowledged when they called to confirm the reservation. They then forgot about it when we were there. I shouldn't really complain since I forgot to mention it too. Everything was very good and proportioned just right. The Ho'Js were awesome!! Orange creamsicle in a glass!!
